author: Bill Lingis
title: Bill Lingis
text: Clara took the time to make me feel comfortable helping me choose the right theater seats for me sight unseen. She thoroughly described the differences between the seats I requested which helped me decide that the Seatcraft Diamante seats would best fit my comfort and taste. She promptly provided a Quote: and when I called back the following day, Alec took my call. Clara was out on the floor so he fulfilled my order and made sure my product shipped the following business day. Great team at 4Seating.com. Looking forward to receiving my chairs next week! They may be called 4Seating but I'm giving them 5 Stars!
